channel.description: Basics and configuration Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Pull overview and configuration from the existing doc into this doc Links to original docs: Refresh access tokens: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/refresh-tokens/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code
